home.welcomeText:
Welcome to the JobApplicants app. With this application you will be able to maintain the list of your employees at your company.
You will be able to maintain the list of candidates applying to your published job posts on different social media.
This app will help you to create email templates that you can then send later to your employees or candidates by a clicking a single button
For more information how to use this app go to the Help section.

You must login with your company credentials to start using the app. Please login to start TUTORIAL

settings.settingsText: Here you can configure settings. To start, visit one of the settings tabs!

emailTemplatePage.cannotFindAnyEmailTemplates: Error! Cannot find any email templates!

deleteEmailTemplateButton.doYouWantToDeleteThisEmailTemplate: Do you want to delete this email template?

deleteProfile.doYouWantToDeleteThisProfile: Do you want to delete this profile? The action cannot be undone!

serverAction.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong, please try again or contact support.
serverAction.cannotSaveChanges: Something went wrong, cannot save changes, please try again or contact support.
serverAction.usernameDoesNotExist: Username does not exist! Please register first.
serverAction.passwordDoesNotMatch: Password does not match! Please try again or contact support.
serverAction.newMappedEmailSettingsCreatedSuccessfull: New mapped email settings created successfully
serverAction.companyEmailConfigurationNotFound: Company email configuration not found! Cannot send the email!
serverAction.cannotCreateUser: Cannot create user! Please try again or contact support!
serverAction.cannotSendAnEmailToYou: Cannot send an email to you! Registration failed! Please try again or contact support.
serverAction.emailDeleted: Email template has been successfully deleted!

tutorial.candidates: Before you start using this app, we need you to show you how to setup important settings. Without them some functionalities of this app will not be working properly. Lets visit the 'SETTING' section of an app. You can skip this tutorial at any given time.
tutorial.settings: We are at the 'SETTINGS'. Here we have tabs for different sections of Settings. Lets visit the first one!
tutorial.companyEmailConfiguration: This form is very important! It allows you to setup email configuration. Pass all required information of your email provider. To change already existing configuration, just visit this section again and fill the form and save the changes. New configuration is in effect immediately!
tutorial.companyEmailConfiguration2: Lets visit the next section of settings!
tutorial.setupEmailTemplateMessages: Here we can configure an email templates! Why writing the same email over again when you can just send an template, filled with proper information. To start, in the field 'NAME' you assign the name of the template. Next you can select the preexisting or create a new one. You may also upload a company logo which will be included later in a sending email. Changes can be saved on click on an button 'SAVE CHANGES'.
tutorial.setupEmailTemplateMessages2: Toolbar is here to help you to insert necessary HTML tags in editor. Named buttons insert a specific constants in editor e.g. [COMPANY_NAME]. They will be later replaced with a proper information when you send an email!
tutorial.setupEmailTemplateMessages3: Here write any email template as HTML markup. Use the toolbar to easy insert HTML tags.
tutorial.setupEmailTemplateMessages4: See the written template as it would be displayed in a sent email!
tutorial.setupEmailTemplateMessages5: Lets visit the next section of settings!
tutorial.overviewEmailTemplateMessages: Here you can see the saved email templates as data in table. Action icons in table rows allows you to edit existing email templates or deleting them!
tutorial.overviewEmailTemplateMessages2: Lets visit the next section of settings!
tutorial.mapTemplateMessages: Here assign email templates to proper 'ACTIONS: archive, hire, reject'. New settings are in effect immediately!
tutorial.mapTemplateMessages2: Lets see the 'CANDIDATES' section of the app!
tutorial.candidates2: Table allows you to see candidates data. On clicking buttons such as 'ARCHIVE', 'HIRE', 'REJECT' will trigger sending an email, based on mapped template email for specific action, defined in 'SETTINGS/MAP TEMPLATE MESSAGES'. By clicking CV cloud icon, you can download candidates's CV. By clicking the Linkedin icon you can visit its Linkedin page. THIS IS THE END OF TUTORIAL

formValidation.mustBe10orMoreCharactersLong: Must be 10 or more characters long
